Html:
Hi

i was wondering if anyone can help me out with this error im getting? i am trying to open the source code but every time i try i get the error Unrecognized project. No adapter available. i have xna installed and also visual express 2008 thanks...

jdrake3 wrote:

Or you could download the 3.1 Version.

Yeah sure, if you want to run the oldest source :) The most recent one (which is pretty old anyways ) requires 4.0 .

This sounds as though it may just be a problem with VS2008 reading the 2010 solution file.

If you download the free Windows Phone version of visual studio 2010 (which i think is part of the WP7 sdk) you should be good to go.
